title: Game wont load!
body:
Hey guys! Lemun is here. so i started playing LoL today and i have came across a problem. when i join a game (Dosen't matter if it's a tutorial , players VS ai , normal) i choose the charchter i want for example ahri. The count down ends and i wait for the game to load. it wont load even after 10 minutes. After 3 minutes i will go back to the launcher and it will tell me "reconnect" so i click it and the same thing happens. N-O-T-H-I-N-G Happens. Now i have "timeout ban" for being "AFK" in games. WTF?
Please help! i have:
-unistalled LoL
-restarted my computer
-logged out and in

replies.body: That's crappy, sorry this is happening to you.  :(  When you finish champion select, your connection needs to transition over to the game server but it seems that a possible unstable network is preventing that.  See if the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help here.  A reinstall focuses more on game files, so it wouldn't do a lot in this case.  I hope that helps!
